head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHEIFETZ, EDWARD R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHEIFETZ, EDWARD R.

block.p: CHEIFETZ-Edward R. Of Far Rockaway. Beloved husband of the late Natalie. Devoted father of Steven, Barry and Jeffrey. Fond brother of Carol Schneider and Michael. Services today, 2:30 PM, at ''Boulevard - Riverside,'' 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, LI. In lieu of flowers donations to JusticeWorks Community, 1012 8th Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11215, would be appreciated.
